title: Is there an ETA on Club Leaders being re-added to their Clubs?
body: It's been a while since the last time a "fix" was posted in the patch notes, but I'm still not able to see the chat of my own club nor do I have the club tag.

replies.body: Yeah, it seems like the issue has been lingering for some players.  In these one-off cases, I'm happy to take a look [or you can submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)], and get that re-sync'd.  As long as it's appropriate, toss me your club name and tag.  I'll see what I can do!

Springbelly is the Club name and BeIIy (with capital i's) is the tag, I think. Or maybe it's Springbelly Family. It's Pandaren. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Booped!  Should be good to go now, just relog.  Send Nomi my regards, I've only waited 64 years for a new recipe.  
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Can you do the same for me? My club name is League of Bard Mains, and the tag is LoBM.
Booped!  You may need to relog, but it should be fine now.
